title: Master of Science in Engineering [MSc.Eng]
description: Graduation. Field: Computer Science with a focus on system modeling and data security.

title: Software Developer
description: Six months Full-time internship (37.5 hrs/week) as part of B.Eng education.

title: Software Developer
description: Transition to part-time (15 hrs/week) parallel to study activities during B.Eng and MSc.Eng educations.

title: Software Developer
description: Transition to full-time (37.5 hrs/week). Work focused on designing and implementing web-applications and web-services, mainly in the Java and Spring ecosystems.

title: Security in modern web-applications
description: Work-sponsored certification course showcasing the most common security issues and vulnerabilities in modern web-applications, and leaning how to combat these.
